column9:
If you’ve ever been to Gothenburg then the name ‘John Scott’ will be instantly recognizable as there is literally one on every corner in the centre of the City. It was therefore not a surprise to see one in Lund Town Centre.

Having come across...More

column7: Nice friendly spot for drinks and lunch
column9: Lovely English themed pub in the centre of Lund. Staff are very welcoming, the beer prices are good for Sweden, and the food was really tasty.

Came across this place because we had become familiar with this brewery in Göteborg. These are lovely pubs . Yes expensive in Comparison to Uk but that’s to be expected in Sweden. In true Swedish style we have learnt to sit with a pint and...More
Tasty large lunch! Service minded waiter. Fast service. Nice interiour. Outdoor serving. Good location.

column7: A british style pub with a relaxed social atmosphere.
column9: This pub certainly delivers when it comes british interior, with an excellent assortment of beers,ales, and spirits both international and local. The staff are serviceminded, and helpful. If you want  a relaxed socail atmosphere without the sportsbar feel, this is the place to be. There...More
